properties.description: Ingest event driven (adhoc) csv file to adls

directory.value:
@concat('raw',
'/', 
substring(item().name,0, indexof(item().name,'.')),
'/',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcnow(), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
'/',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcnow(), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'HH'),
'/',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcnow(), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'mm'),
'/',
formatDateTime(convertFromUtc(utcnow(), 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'ss')
)

properties.description: set the status message from a calling pipeline and constructs a subject and a message

activities.name: Switch status
activities.description: Construct a message and subject depending on the supplied status of either "success'" or "fail"

message.value: @concat(pipeline().parameters.triggeredPipeline,' has NO valid status: ',pipeline().parameters.status, ' expecting Failed or Succeed')
